subject: Settings page success/error banners not announced
description: SettingsPage renders success/error banners as plain divs without role="status"/aria-live, so updates aren\'t announced to assistive tech. Add aria-live (polite for success, assertive for error) or role="status"/"alert", and optionally aria-describedby on inputs. File: packages/web/src/app/(dashboard)/settings/page.tsx:32-52.
